alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 11:36PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BEAUREGARD PARISH...TYLER...NORTHERN NEWTON AND NORTHERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 AM CDT... At 1136 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Macune, or 15 miles north of Ebenezer, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Woodville, Newton, Colmesneil, Chester, Ebenezer, Rockland, Town Bluff, Burkeville, Browndell, Farrsville, Magnolia Springs, Mayflower, Spurger, Jamestown, Roganville, Harrisburg, Junction, Stringtown, and Ivanhoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
